sections.heading: to minor.If a financial institution is required or permitted to make payment pursuant to sections 30-2716 to 30-2733 to a minor designated as a beneficiary, payment may be made pursuant to the Nebraska Uniform Transfers to Minors Act or pursuant to any other laws of this state

sections.text:
30-2731.Payment to minor.

If a financial institution is required or permitted to make payment pursuant to sections 30-2716 to 30-2733 to a minor designated as a beneficiary, payment may be made pursuant to the Nebraska Uniform Transfers to Minors Act or pursuant to any other laws of this state.

SourceLaws 1993, LB 250, ยง 17.

Cross ReferencesNebraska Uniform Transfers to Minors Act, see section 43-2701.
